Name: HEXOPODS
About the game: Hexopods is the frenetic twin-stick shooter for hardcore players! Try to beat your friends or an AI in this multiplayer bullet hell! Adapt your experience as you please with its modular game modes for infinite replayability! 4 different ships with unique playstyles Fast and intense fights! 4 different adaptable maps Hard to play, Impossible to master No random, only skill to win! Multiple lives for each player A timeout with a shrinking arena! Power-ups on the map A moving 'king of the hill' with customizable reward An hexagonal shield rotating around your ship! And many more!
